SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc42
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.view

Class LoginViewController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.view.LoginViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable, Serializable
public class LoginViewController extends Object implements Observable
This class creates and handles the behavior of the Login Screen. This screen allows the Player to input the Server's IP Address, to select a Network Mode (RMI or Socket) and to pick a NickName. It checks if a NickName is valid before allowing the User to go to the next Screen. This class is Observable: the Listeners are notified when the User is ready to go to the next Screen.
See Also:
